# {{lb|zh|musical instruments}} A type of Chinese [[sounding]] [[stone]] (''[[磬|qing]]'') used primarily in ritual/ceremonial music. It is a single thin piece of limestone or jade cut in an L-shape, hung from a frame, and struck with a wooden mallet.
